text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs
description: This quote emphasizes the importance of passion and commitment in achieving excellence in your work.

text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein
description: A reminder that challenges often lead to new opportunities and growth.

text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
description: This quote encourages self-belief and overcoming doubts to reach our full potential.

text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt
description: This quote emphasizes the importance of having a vision and believing in yourself.

text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius
description: A reminder that progress, no matter how small, is still progress.

text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi
description: This quote stresses the importance of personal responsibility in creating a better world.

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill
description: An inspiring quote about resilience and the importance of perseverance.

text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson
description: This quote encourages persistence and not being distracted by time.

text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela
description: A quote reminding us that difficult tasks can often feel overwhelming but are achievable.

text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
description: A reflection on the importance of inner strength and character.
